text: Didier Patrick Queloz (born February 23, 1966) is a Swiss astronomer. He is a professor at the University of Geneva and the University of CambridgeCavendish Website and a fellow of Trinity.Cambridge Press Release He shared the 2019 Nobel Prize in Physics with Michel Mayor and Jim Peebles. == References == == Other websites == * "SAO/NASA Astrophysics Data System (ADS)", query for Didier Queloz. Includes 200 abstracts with Queloz listed as an author or co- author a/o February 23, 2017. title: Didier Queloz
